segments.advisor_message: Alright, so let’s talk about your dependent. Can you tell me their full name?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, it’s, uh, Jessi? I think that’s right. Wait, what do you wanna know exactly?

segments.advisor_message: Thanks! And when was Jessi born? We need that date for the records.
segments.client_message: Oh, right! It’s, um, 15-06-2005. I remember that cause it’s right in the middle of June, you know?
